# TorchMeter

Welcome to `Torchmeter` ‚è≤Ô∏è !!!

`Torchmeter` is an **all-in-one** tool for Pytorch model analysis üöÄüöÄüöÄ, 
providing methods in measuring 
- Params
- FLOPs/MACs(aka. MACC or MADD)
- Memory cost
- Inference time
- Throughput!!
